title: Business Analyst in Jaipur
description:
Key Responsibilities


Collect, clean, and analyze large datasets to identify trends and insights.
Develop reports, dashboards, and visualizations using tools such as Tableau, Power BI, or Excel.
Work closely with stakeholders to understand business needs and translate them into data-driven solutions.
Use statistical methods to identify patterns, correlations, and anomalies in data.
Optimize and automate data collection and analysis processes.
Ensure data accuracy and integrity by implementing best practices in data management.
Support data-driven decision-making through detailed reporting and recommendations.
Present findings and insights to both technical and non-technical audiences.


About Company: We love creating synergies in children's overall grooming. With our expertise and prowess, we continuously strive to deliver an excellent service that guarantees an unparalleled experience to an array of fashion enthusiasts.
